<a id="CanvasItemMaterial"></a>

# CanvasItemMaterial

**Inherits:** [Material](Material.md) **\<** [Resource](Resource.md) **\<** [RefCounted](RefCounted.md) **\<** [Object](Object.md)

A material for [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md)\\ s.

<!-- classref-introduction-group -->

## Description

**CanvasItemMaterial**\\ s provide a means of modifying the textures associated with a CanvasItem. They specialize in describing blend and lighting behaviors for textures. Use a [ShaderMaterial](ShaderMaterial.md) to more fully customize a material's interactions with a [CanvasItem](CanvasItem.md).

<!-- classref-reftable-group -->

## Enumerations

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BlendMode](CanvasItemMaterial.md#enum_CanvasItemMaterial_BlendMode) **BLEND_MODE_MIX** = `0`

Mix blending mode. Colors are assumed to be independent of the alpha (opacity) value.<a id="CanvasItemMaterial_constant_BLEND_MODE_ADD"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BlendMode](CanvasItemMaterial.md#enum_CanvasItemMaterial_BlendMode) **BLEND_MODE_ADD** = `1`

Additive blending mode.<a id="CanvasItemMaterial_constant_BLEND_MODE_SUB"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BlendMode](CanvasItemMaterial.md#enum_CanvasItemMaterial_BlendMode) **BLEND_MODE_SUB** = `2`

Subtractive blending mode.<a id="CanvasItemMaterial_constant_BLEND_MODE_MUL"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BlendMode](CanvasItemMaterial.md#enum_CanvasItemMaterial_BlendMode) **BLEND_MODE_MUL** = `3`

Multiplicative blending mode.<a id="CanvasItemMaterial_constant_BLEND_MODE_PREMULT_ALPHA"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[BlendMode](CanvasItemMaterial.md#enum_CanvasItemMaterial_BlendMode) **BLEND_MODE_PREMULT_ALPHA** = `4`

Mix blending mode. Colors are assumed to be premultiplied by the alpha (opacity) value.<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LightMode](CanvasItemMaterial.md#enum_CanvasItemMaterial_LightMode) **LIGHT_MODE_NORMAL** = `0`

Render the material using both light and non-light sensitive material properties.<a id="CanvasItemMaterial_constant_LIGHT_MODE_UNSHADED"></a>

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LightMode](CanvasItemMaterial.md#enum_CanvasItemMaterial_LightMode) **LIGHT_MODE_UNSHADED** = `1`

<!-- classref-enumeration-constant -->

[LightMode](CanvasItemMaterial.md#enum_CanvasItemMaterial_LightMode) **LIGHT_MODE_LIGHT_ONLY** = `2`

Render the material as if there were only light.<hr class="classref-section-separator"/>

## Property Descriptions

<a id="CanvasItemMaterial_property_blend_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[BlendMode](CanvasItemMaterial.md#enum_CanvasItemMaterial_BlendMode) **blend_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#CanvasItemMaterial_property_blend_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_blend_mode**\ (\ value\: [BlendMode](CanvasItemMaterial.md#enum_CanvasItemMaterial_BlendMode)\ )
- [BlendMode](CanvasItemMaterial.md#enum_CanvasItemMaterial_BlendMode) **get_blend_mode**\ (\ )

The manner in which a material's rendering is applied to underlying textures.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CanvasItemMaterial_property_light_mode"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[LightMode](CanvasItemMaterial.md#enum_CanvasItemMaterial_LightMode) **light_mode** = `0` [ðŸ”—](#CanvasItemMaterial_property_light_mode)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_light_mode**\ (\ value\: [LightMode](CanvasItemMaterial.md#enum_CanvasItemMaterial_LightMode)\ )
- [LightMode](CanvasItemMaterial.md#enum_CanvasItemMaterial_LightMode) **get_light_mode**\ (\ )

The manner in which material reacts to lighting.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CanvasItemMaterial_property_particles_anim_h_frames"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **particles_anim_h_frames** [ðŸ”—](#CanvasItemMaterial_property_particles_anim_h_frames)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_particles_anim_h_frames**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_particles_anim_h_frames**\ (\ )

The number of columns in the spritesheet assigned as [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) for a [GPUParticles2D](GPUParticles2D.md) or [CPUParticles2D](CPUParticles2D.md).

\ **Note:** This property is only used and visible in the editor if [particles_animation](CanvasItemMaterial.md#CanvasItemMaterial_property_particles_animation) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CanvasItemMaterial_property_particles_anim_loop"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **particles_anim_loop** [ðŸ”—](#CanvasItemMaterial_property_particles_anim_loop)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_particles_anim_loop**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_particles_anim_loop**\ (\ )

If ``true``, the particles animation will loop.

\ **Note:** This property is only used and visible in the editor if [particles_animation](CanvasItemMaterial.md#CanvasItemMaterial_property_particles_animation) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CanvasItemMaterial_property_particles_anim_v_frames"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[int](int.md) **particles_anim_v_frames** [ðŸ”—](#CanvasItemMaterial_property_particles_anim_v_frames)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_particles_anim_v_frames**\ (\ value\: [int](int.md)\ )
- [int](int.md) **get_particles_anim_v_frames**\ (\ )

The number of rows in the spritesheet assigned as [Texture2D](Texture2D.md) for a [GPUParticles2D](GPUParticles2D.md) or [CPUParticles2D](CPUParticles2D.md).

\ **Note:** This property is only used and visible in the editor if [particles_animation](CanvasItemMaterial.md#CanvasItemMaterial_property_particles_animation) is ``true``.

<hr class="classref-item-separator"/>

<a id="CanvasItemMaterial_property_particles_animation"></a>

<!-- classref-property -->

[bool](bool.md) **particles_animation** = `false` [ðŸ”—](#CanvasItemMaterial_property_particles_animation)

<!-- classref-property-setget -->

- `void` **set_particles_animation**\ (\ value\: [bool](bool.md)\ )
- [bool](bool.md) **get_particles_animation**\ (\ )

If ``true``, enable spritesheet-based animation features when assigned to [GPUParticles2D](GPUParticles2D.md) and [CPUParticles2D](CPUParticles2D.md) nodes. The [ParticleProcessMaterial.anim_speed_max](ParticleProcessMaterial.md#ParticleProcessMaterial_property_anim_speed_max) or [CPUParticles2D.anim_speed_max](CPUParticles2D.md#CPUParticles2D_property_anim_speed_max) should also be set to a positive value for the animation to play.

This property (and other ``particles_anim_*`` properties that depend on it) has no effect on other types of nodes.
